## What are the differences in motor vehicle death rates between black and white population groups? 

differences by age

```{r cars}
age_stand_all %>% 
  gather(variable, value, -(gender:race)) %>%
  unite(temp, race, variable) %>%
  spread(temp, value) %>% 
  mutate(bw_percent_diff_death = (Black_death_stand-White_death_stand)/White_death_stand*100)
  
```
